Detailed Description

This view renders the radar.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) updateWithSpatialState: (ARSpatialState *)  spatialState
usingRelativeAltitude: (BOOL)  useRelativeAltitude 

Update the blips shown on the radar, as well as the view extent indicator.

Parameters:
spatialState the new spatial state.
useRelativeAltitude YES iff relative altitudes are used.

Property Documentation

- (NSArray *) features [read, write, copy]

The features that should be displayed on the radar.

The radar's radius in meters.
